narrative.headline: ⚠ 1230 security findings — review before other cleanup. Score shifted 3.9 pts — this is normal after structural changes. Rescan after your next fix to see the real trend. (20 review findings — run `desloppify issues`)

actions.description: 20 review findings need investigation — run `desloppify issues` to see the work queue
111 flat_dirs findings — create subdirectories and use `desloppify move`
309 coupling findings — fix boundary violations with `desloppify move`
13 cycles findings — break cycles by extracting shared code or using `desloppify move`
2003 facade findings — flatten re-export facades or consolidate barrel files
10 uncalled_functions findings — remove dead functions or document why they're retained
6560 structural findings — decompose large files — extract logic into focused modules
77 props findings — split bloated components, extract sub-components
6319 dupes findings — extract shared utility or consolidate duplicates
3257 dict_keys findings — fix dict key mismatches — dead writes are likely dead code, schema drift suggests a typo or missed rename
17671 test_coverage findings — add tests for untested production modules — prioritize by import count
781 responsibility_cohesion findings — split modules with too many responsibilities — extract focused sub-modules
111 unused findings — inspect with `desloppify next` and fix manually
2279 smells findings — inspect with `desloppify next` and fix manually
354 global_mutable_config findings — refactor module-level mutable state — use explicit init functions or dependency injection
152 private_imports findings — stop importing private symbols across module boundaries
1230 security findings — review and fix security findings — prioritize by severity
14852 files need design review — run design review with dimension templates
